spiEvi:
EMF Level 5 
Spirit Box 
Ghost Writing
spiTra:
Spirits can not start hunting for double of time than others Ghosts 
Test the Spirit by starting a 3 minute timer after smudging the ghost. 
If it hunts before the timer is over, it is not a Spirit.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity.
spiAbi: The Spirit has no hidden abilities.
